The Mail of Fennibal "Thunder" Bale was a unique set of enchanted armor once worn by the hero of the Battle of Ingdals Arm.
Mail of Fennibal "Thunder" Bale was an iron set of heavy armor. It possessed a humble +1 defensive enchantment. However, what made it distinct was the magic that created a sound burst every time the wearer of the mail was hit.
This enchanted armor belonged to Fennibal Bale, a hero who lost his life in the  during the Battle of Ingdals Arm. The one-man wrecking crew wore the armor when he charged directly into the human infantry on the other side of the conflict. He single-handedly knocked them back, eventually allowing his allies to win the battle.
As of the , Mail of Fennibal "Thunder" Bale was in the hands of one of the exotic and magic gear vendors doing business in Westgates Market Triangle.
